title: AVG AntiVirus & Internet Security 2015.15.0 Build 6122
description:
INFORMATION

AVG have released the updated/final 2015 versions for AntiVirus & Internet Security security products.

Essential protection that won't get in your way! If you use your computer every day, you need protection that's always there, constantly keeping you safe. With AVG Anti-Virus, you get hassle-free protection against today's most sophisticated threats, online and offline. AVG Anti-Virus includes our unique LinkScannerÃ¯Â¿Â½ to prevent you from accidentally visiting harmful sites. It's faster, smarter security that won't slow you down. AVG Antivirus is one of the most complete programs we have found to date. It includes many new options to make it one of the most effective virus scanners on the market. It is still plagued by horrible slowdowns at times. Even things so simple as just typing an IM can be stopped for several seconds for some reason. If you can get passed the occasional slowdowns of your computer, the scanning functionality of AVG Antivirus is top of the line. With the rewrite of the scanning engine, AVG includes multi-processor support.
